sentences.en: a sport that demands total commitment
sentences.cn: 需要全身心投入的体育运动

sentences.en: a total ban on cigarette advertising
sentences.cn: 香烟广告的全面禁止

sentences.en: A total of thirteen meetings were held to discuss the issue.
sentences.cn: 总共举行了13次会议来讨论该议题。

sentences.en: At least one estimate puts the total tab at $7 million.
sentences.cn: 至少有一个估价把总数定在了700万美元。

sentences.en: At that instant the museum was plunged into total darkness.
sentences.cn: 就在那时，博物馆陷入了一片漆黑。

sentences.en: Each month the total prize kitty is £13.5 million.
sentences.cn: 每个月的彩池奖金总额达1,350万英镑。

sentences.en: From this you can calculate the total mass in the Galaxy.
sentences.cn: 由此你可以算出银河系的总质量。

sentences.en: He is a firm believer in total quality management.
sentences.cn: 他是个极力主张全面质量管理的人。

sentences.en: He looked at her with a total lack of comprehension.
sentences.cn: 他一头雾水地望着她。

sentences.en: He was struck by the artists' total absorption in their work.
sentences.cn: 他被艺术家对创作的全身心投入所打动。

sentences.en: I think that is a total waste of money.
sentences.cn: 我认为那完全是浪费金钱。

sentences.en: Imports totalled $1.5 billion last year.
sentences.cn: 去年的进口总额达15亿元。

sentences.en: Rude taxi drivers clocked up a total of 239 offences in 1990.
sentences.cn: 1990年，出租车司机鲁莽驾驶导致的违章事件总共达239起。

sentences.en: She wrinkled her nose, piqued by his total lack of enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 她皱皱鼻子，为他毫无热情而感到不快。

sentences.en: That’s £7 and £3.50, so the total is £10.50.
sentences.cn: 7英镑加上3.50英镑，所以总数是10.50英镑。

sentences.en: The group had losses totalling $3 million this year.
sentences.cn: 该集团今年总计亏损300万美元。

sentences.en: The job losses will reduce the total workforce to 7,000.
sentences.cn: 职位减少后，在职工人总数将减至7,000人。

sentences.en: The sta-tement of total debits and credits is known as a balance.
sentences.cn: 总借记和总贷记的结算即账户余额。

sentences.en: The total cost of the project would be more than $240 million.
sentences.cn: 该项目的总成本会超过2.4亿美元。

sentences.en: The total of debits must balance the total of credits.
sentences.cn: 借记总额必须与贷记总额相平衡。

sentences.en: the total profit
sentences.cn: 利润总额

sentences.en: The unit's exports will total $85 million this year.
sentences.cn: 该部门今年的出口总额将达8,500万美元。

sentences.en: They said that the total number of cows dying from BSE would be twenty thousand.
sentences.cn: 他们说死于疯牛病的奶牛总数会有2万头。

sentences.en: This brought the total number of accidents so far this year to 113. ＃
sentences.cn: 这使得今年迄今为止发生事故的总数达到 113 起。

sentences.en: This provision gives the president total and unchecked power.
sentences.cn: 这条规定赋予了总统绝对及不受约束的权力。

phrases.tran_cn: 总产量；总输出量；总功率
全面质量管理；综合品质管理
全站仪（全站型电子速测仪的简称，是一种智能型光电测量仪器）；全能测量仪
总体积；总容积；总成交量

trans.tran_en: complete, or as great as is possible
the final number or amount of things, people etc when everything has been counted

trans.tran_cn: 总数达，计算…的总和，彻底毁坏

trans.tran_en: If several numbers or things total a certain figure, that figure is the total of all the numbers or all the things
